characters.character_description: Ariadne is the AI of an alien spaceship that crashed in ancient Greece. This represents an advanced extraterrestrial artificial intelligence system that survived a crash landing on Earth.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: Ariadne is explicitly described as the AI of an alien spaceship, representing an artificial intelligence built (by aliens) from mechanical/electronic components capable of managing a spacecraft.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: Insufficient information is provided about Ariadne's behavior, intentions, or interactions to assess benevolence.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: No information is provided about whether Ariadne behaves as its alien creators intended or what its current status and behavior might be.
